result.name: YouTube Glass - Modern Glassy UI for YouTube
result.description:
I have received an email recently describing all of the changes I should make to this theme. Be excited for new things to come! - 4/6/23

YouTube Glass is a modern web theme for YouTube.com that adds frosted glass blur effects to most panels and UI elements. It adds more curved panels and animations to the UI. With custom theme colors, blur effects, and chip colors, this theme will put the You in (You)Tube.

Report all errors and issues to RG form
https://forms.office.com/r/sAYTdrg8wn

Keywords:
Shadows, Animate, Animated, Transition, Dark Mode, Aero Glass, Modern, Custom Background, Homepage Background, Blur effects, Frosted Glass, Windows 11
